00265 DECLARE_LOCAL_EVENT_TYPE(MULE_EVT_ALLOC_FINISHED, -1);
00266 class CAllocFinishedEvent : public wxEvent
00267 {
00268       public:
00270     CAllocFinishedEvent(CPartFile *file, bool pause, long result)
00271         : wxEvent(-1, MULE_EVT_ALLOC_FINISHED),
00272           m_file(file), m_pause(pause), m_result(result)
00273     {}
00274 
00276     virtual wxEvent *Clone() const;
00277 
00279     CPartFile *GetFile() const throw()  { return m_file; }
00280 
00282     bool    IsPaused() const throw()    { return m_pause; }
00283 
00285     bool    Succeeded() const throw()   { return m_result == 0; }
00286 
00288     long    GetResult() const throw()   { return m_result; }
00289 
00290       private:
00292     CPartFile * m_file;
00293 
00295     bool        m_pause;
00296 
00298     long        m_result;
00299 };

00306 typedef void (wxEvtHandler::*MuleHashingEventFunction)(CHashingEvent&);

00311 #define EVT_MULE_HASHING(func) \
00312     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE_ENTRY(MULE_EVT_HASHING, -1, -1, \
00313     (wxObjectEventFunction) (wxEventFunction) \
00314     wxStaticCastEvent(MuleHashingEventFunction, &func), (wxObject*) NULL),
00315

00320     wxStaticCastEvent(MuleHashingEventFunction, &func), (wxObject*) NULL),
00321

00327
